column4: what do I need to do to see my windows partition on a dual boot machine (Feisty)?
how do I mount it (this is a newbie help channel, right)?
how do i mount my windoze xp partition so I can see it?
firstly, find out the device name for the partition (/dev/hdxy, where x is the letter of the harddrive {a=pri master, b=pri slave, etc) and y is the partition number
